idea: Our Platform (Tatkaal Talent show) provides a one stop solution for all those people who got talent. Where from the opportunity to enhance the skills to get the monetary benefits, everything is offered on this live platform. Here every Indian can participate from anywhere, in the history of RealityTalent shows this has been never be offered by anyone. Where people can participate from anywhere , showcase their talent by participating in different challenges offered by the application and most important aspects is, the winner is decided by the public. It's completely at the discretion of the people to nominate and promote and make winner. No intervention of judges or anyone is there.
name: RISKYLEAD ENTERTAINMENTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NexG Apparels LLP, an ISO 9001:2015 Certified Company, marks its inception with the ideal blend of the vision of the next generation & the vast experience of over four decades of the senior generation. We at NexG specialize in manufacturing protective clothing and bespoke safety apparels designed to meet your safety needs under the most extreme work environments.

NexG is relentlessly engaged in providing highly competent products, tried and tested to withstand the most challenging working environments under the most perilous situations. Apart from our existing wide range of safety products, we provide innovative solutions as per the clients' customized requirements, with our special engineered products, produced in accordance to stringent quality control policies.The products offered by NexG Apparels LLP meet the stringent international norms for Personal Protective Equipments (PPE) and the garments are CE certified as well. In addition, some products are also tested and certified as per the various NFPA / ASTM norms

Established in the year 2015, we, NexG Apparels are one of the reputed exporters, manufacturers and suppliers of Industrial Boiler Suit, Fire Resistant Coverall, Structural Fire Fighting suit(Turn Out Gear), Aluminized Fire Proximity Suit, Fire entry suit, Molten metal protective suit, Cut Resistant suit, Arc Flash Suit, Safety Gloves etc. and these products are widely used in diverse industries like oil & gas, safety, construction, engineering, molten metal industries and various electric power industries . The entire range offered by us can be designed as per the customer's demands, as we also provide test certificates for all these suits.
name: NEXG APPARELS LLP

idea: Welcome ….We would like to introduce you ourselves as “RITE ZONE CHEMICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED”, a construction chemicals division. We offer complete construction solutions by supplying a complete range of various chemical products related to civil construction, Infrastructure, building & structure including pre-construction or post constructions. Rite Zone Chemicals has been promoted by highly experienced qualified team in their respective field having experience of over 10 to 12 year in the Construction Chemicals Industry. The team through its dedication and hard-work in this field are fore seeking to be the pioneer pillars of the future of this Company. Our experienced technical persons capable to manufacture tailor made product as well as specified products as per clients’ requirement and specifications. Our production process undergoes strict quality control check–batch to batch. The production facilities are backed up by sophisticated R & D laboratory equipped with latest testing equipments. We motivate our clients to purchase our High-end products, which give desired outputs. Our emphasis is mainly on consistency of product, efficient services and timely delivery. We take pride in manufacturing our products, which offer maximum client satisfaction and are set to meet the International standards.
name: RITE ZONE CHEMICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Built on the bedrock of reliability and accountability the ethos that governs the management helps to safeguard the interests of stakeholders, employees, vendors and clients alike. The enterprise also believes in sustainability and strives to lessen the carbon footprints to further protect ecological environs of the surrounding.

The company also complies with the standard operating norms of safety for its employees. It also follows a zero-tolerance to any lapses that could result in harm to anyone and has set the highest standards of safety for all. The governing policy in inter dependency and reliance is yet another mantra that the venture follows to advance and progress in its sphere of business. JRD Mines is now collaborating with the top gun M/S Rana Engineering for expansion and progress.
name: JRD MINES AND MINERALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Learning Management System (LMS) is a software application for the administration, documentation, tracking, reporting and delivery of electronic educational technology (also called e-learning) courses or training programs.It allows professors to post grades, information, and assignments online. It is to replace some of the normal time spent in the traditional classroom.
name: LMS

idea:
To carry on in India and abroad the business of distributors, transporter, traders, retailers, marketing and suppliers by creating online link

with the customer, to advertise and promote the business online for distribution of petrol, diesel, Light diesel, High speed diesel, LPG,

Engine Oil, CNG, CBG, LNG and other related products with the help of an ecommerce website and/or mobile applications and to ensure

maintenance of continuous and smooth supplies of petroleum products by way of reselling and transportation and to further enhance

marketing infrastructure and reseller network for providing assured service to customers throughout the country and to do all such act

which is necessary to attainment of the main object.
name: INFANT FUEL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Living things is an IOT Product Platform that makes things (devices) smart to make human life better.


We are a SINE-IIT Bombay incubated company.


The problem being solved -

Day-to-day problems faced by air conditioner users like high energy consumption, negligent use of a/c, inconvenience caused due to a/c remotes, indoor air quality.


Product / Idea -

Living Things AIRCON, a device which just goes and sits on your AC , helps you to automate, schedule and save energy through our mobile application.

AIRCON enables you to switch on/off, automate & schedule your existing air conditioner from anywhere, anytime. It alerts you about the air conditioner's running status and helps you to avoid negligence. It can also be controlled by voice.

It is compatible with any brand of air conditioner. The E-Mode helps you to save 15% on energy consumption thus saving you on your high e-bills.
name: Living Things

idea: AEL Engineers expertise in providing 360 degree solution to RAIN WATER HARVESTING system including Designing to its implementation for housing societies, It parks etc facing water scarcity.
name: AEL ENGINEERS
